phrs.translation: 矮小的人, 无足轻重的小人物

sentences.sentence: Louis: Come out, you little pipsqueak and fight like a man!
sentences.translation: 路易斯：出来，你这小不点儿，是男人就出来跟我斗一斗。

sentences.sentence: Lawson has been around long enough to see off pipsqueak MPs, even if their questions are, actually, quite valid.
sentences.translation: 劳森是老手了，能够赶走无足轻重的议员，尽管他们的问题实际上是非常正当的。

sentences.sentence: Pipsqueak realizes she already had everything she ever dreamed of and all she really wants is to find a way back home.
sentences.translation: 但是他们同心协力，他们——朱朱英雄拯救了世界！ 点点意识到她已经拥有了她梦想的一切，而她真正想要的就是回家。
